website_summaries.verdict: With unusually tall feet and a tight grid, this stainless steel rack cools baked goods quickly and at a great price.
pros: Its 6 feet stand 1" high for better air circulation and faster cooling
The rack is dishwasher safe, with a stainless steel construction that inhibits rust
cons: The 3/8" squares of the grid can sometimes trap small food particles and be tough to clean

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, but QC issues
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and versatile cooling rack that I use in my smoker so that bacon doesn’t fall through the grates. The cross supports are heavy duty and solid. This unit is higher quality vs other brands, but it also costs more too. I docked 1-star for lack of quality control. I included a photo of the one I received with some messed up welds. Not a big deal, but I expected it to be straight. I did try to bend the wires back, but they’re welded solid.
customer_reviews.author: Pidasso

customer_reviews.title: Does Double Duty
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this specifically for cooking bacon in the oven. I use a cookie sheet lined with aluminum foil and this rack set on the foil. It holds eight to ten strips of bacon, and clean up is a breeze. This rack fits in the bottom rack of my dishwasher and comes out sparkling clean. I throw away the foil, and put the cookie sheet away when done. So much easier and cleaner than frying bacon on the stovetop, and the bacon is not sitting in grease. Plus, I use this rack as a cooling rack with baking. Couldn't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: L. Hovland

customer_reviews.title: but the one from Kichenatics is slightly bigger so it fits the half sheet pan better (yet what's funny is that neither is actually a ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with one of the legs only half attached. The rack was also uneven so it rocks in my Nordic Ware half sheet pan. I ordered another one from another company that costs $1 more. The two seemed quite similar, but the one from Kichenatics is slightly bigger so it fits the half sheet pan better (yet what's funny is that neither is actually a perfect fit...). The other one just seemed shiner for some reason, but I decided to stick with another company since they came with no defects. Material-wise this may be good enough, but craftmanship-wise, the other wins.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki N.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, stainless steel, nice grid pattern.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my pan/cookie sheet. Was looking for a pure stainless cooking rack. I do not use toxic non-stick cookware and wanted something sturdy and healthy. This fit the bill, love it. Would like to get more sizes in this same brand and quality. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product. :)
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible racks for using in the oven. I purchased these to "dry" thin slices of sweet potato in the oven. The chewy potato slices make great, healthy dog treats. The racks are perfect for this purpose. Before I purchased the racks, I put the potato slices on my half-sheet baking pans lined with parchment paper, and turned them half way through their baking time. With the racks (set on the the baking pans), I don't have to turn them. And they don't stick at all to the racks. This is exactly what I was hoping for. I highly recommend these baking racks to everyone. :)
customer_reviews.author: B and J

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel, but not 302 as claimed
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made and will probably work OK, but it is not 302 stainless steel as claimed. 302 Stainless steel is non magnetic, highly corrosion resistant, and often used for high-end cookware. The steel in this rack is magnetic, but not as much as regular steel. It might be a 400 series stainless steel which is similarly magnetic. It is also possible that it is a recycled blend of stainless steel that has no pedigree. It will probably work OK, but I do not like companies that lie about their products.
customer_reviews.author: Bioengineer

customer_reviews.title: Great staple item for any home cook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack to use with a deep sheet pan as a roasting rack for my Thanksgiving turkey. I read it worked better than an actual roasting pan, was inexpensive, and allowed for optimal heat circulation. My turkey was roasted to perfection. The rack was heavy duty and held the weight of the 14lb turkey with no issues and cleaned up really nicely. Definitely recommend and great for multi use in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Coolest
customer_reviews.text: Received the rack yesterday and used it this morning, results were great. It fit perfect in my nordicware one quart sheet pan. I used cooking spray on the rack and bake my protein at 350 degree for 30 minutes, no warping. This rack is sturdy and well even if it is made in China. The Kitchenatics Company offer a lifetime warranty, just register your product.
customer_reviews.author: RRB

customer_reviews.title: I use this all the time.  It's excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a cooling rack for baked goods of course, but it's more versatile than that. I also use it to elevate a roast above the juices in the pan to keep it from getting soggy as it cooks to perfection. I just throw it in the dishwasher after I use it and it comes out spotlessly clean every time. My pizza's have crunchy crusts and my roasts have perfect texture and taste. I consider it indispensable.
customer_reviews.author: Slushpuppy154

customer_reviews.title: The best I've found
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use racks to cook bacon in the oven. The smaller grid size supports the bacon better and the size is as large as you can get while still fitting into the pan. To clean it, I just throw it into the dishwasher after removing some large chunks. It generally gets it perfectly clean, which is great. The rack seems to be very sturdy and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: N. Franke

customer_reviews.title: Great for BACON!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I learned about baking bacon, that was it for me. Now the rack that came with my convection oven was really, really tough to clean. By hand was awful, the dishwasher just spread the flakes around the inside of it. The reason I gave this a 3 for cleaning, is that it's a similar mess to deal with , easier to hand clean, but still throws stuff around the dishwasher. But works soooooo great on baking bacon!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Schubert

customer_reviews.title: I love it & want another!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality. It fits perfectly in a quarter sheet pan or cake pan. It’s also a good cooling rack. I ordered the 8.5 size & will want the larger size as well. I wash by hand so don’t know how it does in the dishwasher but considering the quality I would guess it does great!
customer_reviews.author: Z96

customer_reviews.title: Great value in a cooling rack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set of two to fit the half sheet pans I just bought [Nordic Ware Natural Aluminum Commercial Baker's Half Sheet (2 Pack), Silver]. These were replacements for old rusted racks and pans I used for many years. I have only used the cooling racks for cooling baked goods thus far but intend to use them for roasting as well. As with any decent cookware, hand wash. Dishwashers stain and shorten the life of pieces like this. Very sturdy and well-constructed. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: High quality, well made that doesn't rust!
customer_reviews.text: You owe it to yourself to buy one of these they're the real deal... quit buying the cheap one's that rust and get the real thing. I am very pleased with the quality of craftsmanship and I should know, I've been in manufacturing for over 30 years and I know quality. You won't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gnarly Ed

customer_reviews.title: One of the Racks was Bent
customer_reviews.text: I just received by cooling racks today and one of the rows was bent out of shape. I'm not sure how this happened, I doubt it happened during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hwang

customer_reviews.title: keep finding uses for these
customer_reviews.text: I use these way more than i thought i would. I bought two. So they make the perfect steak on the blackstone griddle. First i Sear the steak using very high heat for 2 minutes on each side. Then i use these to lift the steak off the griddle and cover them with a cover. The combination of searing, lifting and covering all the sear and bake process to keep the steak Juicy. I clean these super easy. When i am done I heat my blackstone up and put these on the blackstone top, then i put water on the griddle and the steam rises and cleans these. I then wipe off with a paper towel. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: roger larson

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I like that the bottom of these don't fold, which makes storing them, using them, and cleaning them infinitely easier than those with the legs that pop out. It allows cookies and bread to cool without being too far off the counter. They can also be put on cookie sheets and used for baking things like chicken wings in the oven and all the grease catches underneath. I love that they are oven safe. I've used them for multiple different things are they are great to have. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie ATop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not like it should be
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. Bought for pan it is supposed to be used with but is always slipping and coming part way out of pan. Totally not recommended
customer_reviews.author: J Fox

customer_reviews.title: Better than a small size air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: “Great product performs better than described. Have tried many new items prepared on this rack and I am pleased with the excellent results. This large size rack can cook a large baked quantities without buying a small capacity air fryer. Great quality. Cleans well in the dishwasher with a prewash brush off of large food particles. Get the largest size you can for your largest pan. “
customer_reviews.author: PIRATE40

customer_reviews.title: Well-made
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely crafted product. Very sturdy and it fits my quarter sheet pans nicely; no large gaps along the edges. The craftsmanship is exceptional, all the welds attaching the feet to the outer frame we well made and smooth. The ends of the grid wires were welded to the frame and every end was bevelled and smooth. There were no sharp points anywhere; it won't snag my kitchen towels when I dry it. I am glad I bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: RJC

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, wires were thinner than expected and they were crooked. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DSN

customer_reviews.title: This is great for baking meats (especially previously frozen ones) and sweet ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great for baking meats (especially previously frozen ones) and sweet potato fries as it drains the moisture onto a drip pan below. In the past, I've had issues with "boiling" previously frozen meat rather than baking it since the liquids from previously frozen meat would drain out during the baking process, resulting in soggy baked meat. My only advice is to be sure you spray the rack with cooking oil before placing meat on it. Otherwise, you'll have a heck of a time trying to scrape off those tiny pieces of meat stuck within those multitude of cracks and crevices.
customer_reviews.author: Peppermint Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellant cooling rack; perfect for 1/4 sheet pan
customer_reviews.text: The KITCHENATICS 100% Stainless Steel Wire Cooling is well made and is the perfect size for 1/4 Sheet Pans and for roasting pans of that general size. Perfect for cooling off small baking's from you toaster oven. I have also used this in conjunction with my 1/4 sheet pan when I "brine" (salt) beef/steak in the refrigerator. If you use a 1/4 sheet pan or a roasting pan of similar size and need a cooking rack this product is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Montycs

customer_reviews.title: Don't rack your brain! Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered another one. These racks are sized for my sheet pan, working perfectly for roasting chicken or vegetables. The mesh is small enough to keep even small items from falling through. The racks are very sturdy with strong feet. They clean up easily in the dishwasher or in the sink. As cooling racks for cookies? They're the best I've ever had. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gatekey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't rust
customer_reviews.text: While just browsing Amazon in my off time as any loyal Amazonian would do, I found this rack with good rating. It looked sturdy so I bought it (yes it was an impulse buy). It was over a year ago, while the wife was out of town thinking she won't notice it when she comes back. Well after coming back, she noticed immediately while baking something. Now over one year later, she is still complimenting how strong and useful it is and most importantly, no rust at all after all the washing; not like many other so called "stainless" non-rust products. Now I'm buying a second one in a few minutes, wife demanded it.
customer_reviews.author: St0cktrader

customer_reviews.title: Rack is tilted but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it a three rating because the bottom has prongs that allow the rack to be off the counter. One side the prongs are perfect in a downward V, but other side the prongs are sideways, which has rack tilting. I’m trying to get the prongs to turn to match other side, still useable tho
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: arrived slightly warped
customer_reviews.text: don't know if they're selling factory seconds, or if this happened in transit: it wasn't in a protective box. i was able to bend it almost flat. otherwise it's good quality and it will still serve the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: generic

customer_reviews.title: Happy to get this!
customer_reviews.text: i have been wanting to get a quality roasting rack that would fit in my 9x13 stainless steel pan, This is perfect. It will fit the pan if lined with aluminum foil! I regularly broil salmon, lion lamb chops, and steaks in this pan and had to improvise racks to fit. I also roast pork loin in it. I do not need the big broiler pan from the oven as there are only two of us, and I can keep the oven cleaner using this pan in this way. I have looked for a long time for a rack this size and quality. Great price, too, by the way!
customer_reviews.author: Gal from Kalamazoo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the smaller size of this rack. It fits easily on my cookie sheet, so I can cook meats and vegetables without them touching the pan. It also works well to place hot cookies on. With the legs on the bottom to make the rack sit off the counter, the cookies cool faster as more air gets around them. Like most racks, it can be a challenge to clean due to food getting in the corners of the squares, but this is still my favorite rack and the first one I grab!
customer_reviews.author: Superbizmom

customer_reviews.title: Fits right
customer_reviews.text: Fits my half sheet just right. I'm most impressed by the measurements of the grid; these are tighter squares than others cooling racks I've seen, so more support. Wire seems thicker as well. Not flimsy. I had to set an old super heavy cast iron cauldron on it in a pinch and it didn't buckle. Have used it to bake bacon in the oven over my half sheet, and cool cookies on it. I am pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I anticipated!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack to use in my convection oven. First use, I should have sprayed oil on it before placing my tater-tots, but it worked FABULOUSLY! It sets right into a sheetcake pan, so clean up is super easy. It washed right up and the food crisped up nicely. I would recommend this product and I'm not a paid reviewer.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: One kitchen gadget worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and am anxious to use - sorry to due a review before actually using. I got it specifically for drying fruits and veggies. I've tried it in several cookie sheets and it will work great. I am delighted that it has so many functions in addition to drying - roasting, baking etc. We have a smoker and will test it in the smoker this weekend - Cornish game hens as well as roasted asparagus. No more veggies or shrimp or anything falling through grates. I'll add an edit after using. Also pleased with the cookbook - lots of new ideas!
customer_reviews.author: Mountain14er

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed.  I expect these to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to cook bacon in the oven, but use them for everything. The tighter mesh is a benefit to their sturdiness and versatility, and not a hinderance to clean. They can easily be cleaned in a dishwasher. To hand clean I just flip them over in the pan, let them soak in warm soapy water for a while, and the build-up comes right off. They are very well built. They fit my baking pans perfectly. No wasted space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not 15x10, not even close
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this is great if used for baking/cooling, but I order this because of the size. This is much smaller than 10x15 - so if you need exactly 10x15, this is not you for you.
customer_reviews.author: TheMushroomMan

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice
customer_reviews.text: These are all stainless steel. That is why I was willing to spend more on them. I'm quite happy with these, and I'm looking forward to many years of use. Note, mine had some gentle bends (probably due to shipping). You can bend them back to nearly perfect if you're careful and patient.
customer_reviews.author: Bob the palindrome.

customer_reviews.title: Pick a size and bake
customer_reviews.text: Use it for baking. Use it for cooling. Use it for roasting (with a drip pan, of course). This is the heavy-duty, easy clean-up, leave it to your heirs in your will baking rack you should have gotten in the first place. These come in a variety of sizes, so get the ones you want and stop worrying. You can use them in or out of the oven. The feet are stable. The welds are solid. The finish is consistent and bright. I've had these for years of steady use and they still look and work like new. I had one crushed in a household move and replaced it with one bought at Amazon. It is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: not as sturdy or thick as i wanted or expected
customer_reviews.text: basically a glorifed cooling rack-nothing special. doesnt even clean well for stainless-returned
customer_reviews.author: zelo222

customer_reviews.title: Great little rack - it runs a little smaller than the Nordic Ware pan
customer_reviews.text: Great little rack - it runs a little smaller than the Nordic Ware pan. Otherwise it works
customer_reviews.author: azhirise

customer_reviews.title: Well made stainless steel cooling trays that use all of the available space in a baking tray.
customer_reviews.text: These are well made, with clean welds and no sharp edges. They fit in the dishwasher and clean up easily as a result. I've used them to bake bacon and to drain friend chicken with no complaints about warping with heat during baking or being hard to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this rack 2-3 times a week for various cooking and baking. It is, by far, the best rack I’ve ever used. I use it for everything from baked hot wings to cooling cookies. It hasn’t rusted, warped, or shown any wear whatsoever. Highly recommended if you use your oven as often as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Aerin C. Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Dual duty--Roasting AND Cooling
customer_reviews.text: The day this arrived, I immediately baked 2 lbs of bacon that was waiting for it! Then of course I had to order another one right away--so that now I can do a Full pound (in 2 jelly roll sheets is a *perfect* fit together on same oven rack) in one go! I also love the extra height above all the others; my old cooling racks are history :) These are the best racks ever - I will buy no others now! Very fast shipping too, thank you. ULTIMATE combo with NORDIC WARE (made in USA) natural all-aluminum sheet pans!
customer_reviews.author: robinjay2u

customer_reviews.title: Useful Small Grid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after being disappointed with a cooling rack I bought in the grocery store that I was using to make candied ginger. That rack had Teflon that ripped off and became part of the candy, and the holes were so wide that many pieces just fell straight through. This wrack solved both of those problems! It also seems to be one of the few racks available that has a small grid. I'm not sure what anyone would want a larger grid for... This one also seems very sturdy and well made, so I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Good

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy as well as versatile
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy cooling rack. I like that it has legs in the middle as well as on the ends so there is no sagging in the middle. I plan on using it mostly as a cooling rack but it's nice that I can use it in the oven if I want to. I also appreciated the seller's followup with answers to FAQs and a recipe book. It's going to get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: bshar

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: A nice quality product. Love that it sits higher off the counter. Easier to cool the baked goods that way. Like the flat wire grate, easier to clean. A bit more expensive than some of the others I looked at but worth it. I expect to get years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: After years of using chrome plated racks that collapsed in the middle, this is definitely a step up. I surprised my wife with one, and she was extremely pleased. The quality is evitable, and the rack fits our half-sheet commercial aluminum trays perfectly. Exactly what I need for cooling, roasted, seasoning, et cetera. We will definitely buy at least one more.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy duty cooling/roasting rack. Fits perfectly in a half-sheet pan. I especially like that this rack has 6 feet on it (one in each corner + 2 in the middle) rather than the usual 4 you see in light-duty racks for, say, cooling cookies. Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good, but a bit pricy to me for what it is...
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricy for me, but it is good quality...not sure how much worse a less expensive one would have been, but would probably have tried a cheaper one in hindsight. I did like that the legs are longer than some others I looked at, which is why I chose this one. If that's not important to you, I'd look at a different, less expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: A Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my existing pans
customer_reviews.text: This product is just fine, but apparently the baking sheets I have are not half sheet pans. I thought, "I don't need the pan, I just need the rack," but I was wrong. It's a very good rack though and I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but found a cheaper one.
customer_reviews.text: This rack is great, I happy I purchased it.☺️ I ordered 8.5”x 12”. Updating my review today June 23rd I went to my local Target and found the rack much nicer and cheaper for $9 sorry that means I have to return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Vidal & Candy

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer Here!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great service! Order arrived quickly and the rack turned out to be of a much higher quality and much stronger than expected. Exceeded my expectations! For those who complain it is hard to clean, just thoroughly spray BOTH sides of the rack with cooking spray before adding the meat to the rack. After roasting--remove the food and immediately soak the rack in hot water with dishwashing detergent for 15-30 minutes. A quick scrub-and BINGO! Like new again! Those with larger racks and smaller sinks may need to rotate midway.) My first batch of oven-fried chicken turned out AWESOME! Got another batch on the menu today!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the turkey and roast
customer_reviews.text: Not both at the same time, but I've used this to keep the turkey just off the pan and out of the grease. I had more compliments this year than any before. We also did a roast at Christmas and it came out better. I'm giving a fair amount of credit to the wire rack. My daughter has used it to cool down cookies too. Does what it says and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Well constructed. Dimensions are well suited to bacon (reason for purchase). I use a 3/4 size pan but bought two racks so that I can use two on a full size commercial pan. Using two, I can easily cook a full package of bacon. On rack, I will cook 1/2 package. Cleaning is moderate. You have to soak it and then use a brush.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: This is the rack! Don't look any further!
customer_reviews.text: I received my 2 racks yesterday and they are great! Love that they are stainless steel and of high quality. I will be using mine mainly for cooking bacon in the oven, among other uses. The racks fit my jelly roll pans perfectly. I have attached a photo, because after reading the reviews and getting different answers, I still wasn't sure if the rack was even with the top of my pan, above it or below it. The rack sets about 1/4" inch below the top of my jelly roll pan. This is exactly where I wanted it to fit. The rack is very sturdy and strong. Thank you for a GREAT product!!
customer_reviews.author: Fitch Charley

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This item is not easy to clean. Also, it is very small. Though the quality of the product is very good
customer_reviews.author: tama

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Two racks fit my large cookie sheet perfectly. I use them to cook wings in the oven, cool cookies and cakes and even to bake a pot roast. Great quality and they clean up in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Kim McM

customer_reviews.title: Stainless cooking rack
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for air frying chicken in oven with convection setting. The issue is the four feet it rests on are not even and it totally wobbles when put flat in the roasting pan or tray.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Adashek

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I had bought two other ones and they were such a disappointment, no center brace, holes were much to large and not sturdy what so ever and the legs were 1 inch high and much to large for me. This is great and great stainless steel and so easy to clean when the quality is there. Fits in my large cookie pans great.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki & Chaz Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fit into raised cookie sheets; pricey
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to "fry" bacon in the oven when we have guests. The grate is good and helpful, but I haven't found the oven method satisfactory because of the grease fumes that arise and disperse when the oven door is opened before the hood can catch them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, you know you want to.
customer_reviews.text: If you have legit sheet pans then you need this. Great to bake, roast, rest, or dehydrate. Does the charm and fits just right (measure though cuz just because it fit mine...). The legs are a tad bit long but the quality is great. Food can get stuck in the gaps but what'd you expect. It's not magic. My vote is buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: no more greasy meat loaf.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these so I would have enough cooling racks and roasting racks for chops, fish, etc. They work really super when baking meatloaf, all the fat drains to the pan below. Oh yeah they are great as cooling racks for cakes, pies and cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Delaware Den

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described and was delivered on time. I have not used it yet. I washed it in my dishwasher and it came out like new. It fits my baking pan perfectly. After finally using this cooling rack I am extremely satisfied with it. It keeps my food out of the grease and liquids which makes the meats nice and crispy. I'm sure I'll find many more uses for it. Outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: good to place in a disposable aluminum pan for roasting poultry
customer_reviews.text: Put veggies in a disposable pan--then rack---then half a small turkey or large chicken---oven stayed clean---poultry got nice crispy skin -no splattering-- pan was deep enough--rack raised poultry high enough to crisp
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for baking bacon
customer_reviews.text: We like to bake our bacon (1.5-4 lbs at a time). The old style no stick cooling racks allowed the bacon to semi- fall through and stick. They were a little too big for the baking sheets and were very hard to clean also, the non-stick coating began to flake. This product fits our baking sheets perfectly and the bacon is easier to lift off because it is not falling through. While we thought it would be harder to clean the opposite is true. It is easier than the old racks. It's a good product and solidly made.
customer_reviews.author: Laird M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use to make fries more crispy and works perfectly. Seems to be of high quality, have used several times and have no issues so far. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: BayBay-x-2

customer_reviews.title: Love Kitchenatics!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a smaller version of this rack a while back. Liked it so well, I bought a bigger one! These are sturdy and clean up well. Love that they are dishwasher safe too! Great products at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heavy duty rack
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy duty rack. I used it, along with a sheet pan, to grill a 20lb turkey (spatchcock method) for Thanksgiving. Unlike other racks with shorter legs, this rack elevated the turkey just above the rim of the sheet pan which was the ideal position. The sturdy construction meant that there was no noticeable bending or sagging of the rack even with a 20 pounder sitting on it under high heat for ~2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: George Munson

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this with the intent of using it for his dry aged meat. Upon arriving he realized it was smaller than he expected, so now we will probably use it for cookies! Overall it’s a nice product
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: and fit the pan great, you can roast anything that comes to mind
customer_reviews.text: These racks are exceptional, truly well made, and fit the pan great, you can roast anything that comes to mind, fish, pork, beef, poultry, and my favorite.....VEGGYS! Line your half bake sheet pan with foil, put the rack in, shoot the rack with a non stick spray, and load it up. I used the large rack to make roasted, baked or what ever you call it, Buffalo Wings, I thought I made enough for 2 days, I was fooling myself. You line the bake pan with foil so you don't have to scrub it after cooking, This truly a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hector R. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fits the Nordic Ware Prism quarter sheet perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted to pair up with a Nordic Ware Prism Quarter Sheet for baking, cooling rack, reverse searing steaks. This rack is well made and sturdy and it fits perfectly in the Nordic Ware quarter sheet!
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but needs to be bigger
customer_reviews.text: It's much smaller than I thought. I wanted it to fit in a standard sized baking sheet. We like to have oven baked french fries, but even cut small with a madaleine, it barely fits the equivalent of one potato. Otherwise, it's exactly what it's says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Evo

customer_reviews.title: Love it easy to clean!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for cooking bacon in the oven!! Or for a cooling rack!! Also use it to drain oil from things fried like won tons or lumpia’s!!! Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LeenA

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality Stainless Steel Rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality rack. I use it for cooling muffins and also in my 13x9" Cuisinart baking pan in my Cuisinart convection toaster oven. It fits in the 13x9" dish perfectly for roasting a chicken or veggies in the toaster oven. It is very heavy stainless and I plan to purchase a second one. I highly recommend this sturdy rack. It is my favorite rack in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: LindaCan2

customer_reviews.title: Nice racks...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, fits the pans perfectly, no gaps or overlaps. Sturdy racks. I am using one in the bbq as an alternate grill for smaller items, holding up OK, even after hitting it with 550 heat. Just warped some of the thinner wires a bit. In the oven or regular temperatures they are fine. Good tall feet for using as a cooling rack.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this wonderful product to hold my Keurig machine which I keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wonderful product to hold my Keurig machine which I keep in an appliance center. The rack enables me to elevate my Keurig to prevent water or coffee collecting underneath the machine, and to easily slide the machine onto countertop for use. This is the only rack I could find that was sturdy enough to hold my coffee maker without sagging in the middle. I now want this rack for baking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda W.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to...
customer_reviews.text: This cooling rack is great to use in the oven to bake or cook breaded foods making them crisper as opposed to resting and sticking on a cookie sheet or pan. Place on a cookie sheet and it provides better hot air circulation for better results. It can be a bit tedious cleaning if any food does in fact stick to it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cookie Rack
customer_reviews.text: A cookie rack is one of the products that I never realized I needed, but boy is this a great find! It cools cookies quickly and more evenly, plus it is a breeze to clean. I would happily recommend to other hobby bakers.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit in Nordicware 1/2 sheet
customer_reviews.text: Rack fits perfectly in my 1/2 sheet is is nearly flush with the top. The rack is very heavy and looks great. Washed up and put to use right away. Very pleased with the quality and fit. Also bought the 1/4 sheet rack and it is a perfect match for it. Both pans I am using the racks with are the Nordicware sheets.
customer_reviews.author: WNCChip

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Use to cook meatloaf and veggies on pellet smoker. Does a fine job. I soak in water after use then put in dishwasher. Happy with product !
customer_reviews.author: G. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cooling Rack for Cookies
customer_reviews.text: I like the smaller grid size allowing for different size cookies to cool without falling into a crack. Very sturdy and nice large size!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for multiple functions.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works as advertised. Use not only as a cooling rack, but fits inside my rimmed baking sheet to use as a roasting grill. It seems like a small thing, but it makes all manner of cooking come out so much better. Small grid keeps even soft things (hello, fresh baked cookies) from just melting through.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenA

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose but hand wash to refrain from staining
customer_reviews.text: I love using it to cook and cool stuff. Great for “grilling” in the oven. But even though it’s dishwasher safe, don’t throw it in there without scrubbing everything clean. I usually hand wash these racks but got lazy ONE time and threw it in the dishwasher. Came out with stains. I was devastated.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy, perfect for roasting and for cooling
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, heavy-duty roasting racks. The metal is thick enough that (a) I can set roasts on top without the metal bending and (b) I don't feel like I'm scrubbing away and creating rust-prone areas as I clean the rack. Fits perfectly in half-sheet baking pans. I wish I'd bought these years ago - I'm very glad to have found this item.
customer_reviews.author: tgd721

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd bought it a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: I have several cooling racks but none that I dared put into the oven. I used this one last weekend on my smoker to keep kabobs from falling through the grate. It worked perfectly. I put it in the dishwasher and it's like new.
customer_reviews.author: Susan from Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These racks are sturdy, not flimsy at all and they are SS as advertised. Cooking bacon is awesome and easy clean up and less greasy bacon. Put a pizza on the rack and you will get a nice crispy crust!!
customer_reviews.author: Softail

customer_reviews.title: Great wire racks.
customer_reviews.text: These are great wire racks for the kitchen. They are very sturdy and well-made. Like all wire racks depending on what you're cooking May sometimes can be a challenge to clean
customer_reviews.author: Realworld

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: So small. I feel stupid bc I didn't notice the size, so not the product fault but mine. Works great so far for chicken and cookies but can't fit much in it. For the price, I wouldn't repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This rack feels & looks to be well made. We live in a motor home with a small microwave/convection oven. My original roasting pan came with a V rack, which greatly limited the size of poultry/roasts that I could cook. This rack has allowed me to add larger roasting options to our menu.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy205

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time from making burgers and steaks to cooling cookies. So easy to clean. Cleans well in the dishwasher. Has held up well so far and has been rust free.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional, but quality could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: The rack was a bit warped so it does not sit entirely flat, but it is functional and of sturdy construction. I'm sure they make these by the gazillions for everyone to private label. It's a matter of chance if you happen to get one of the less than perfect pieces. It appears to be all stainless (barely magnetic - so not coated steel) and it cleaned well in the dishwasher. I would say it's OK for the price.
customer_reviews.author: wcoyotesg

customer_reviews.title: Wire rack
customer_reviews.text: This is good for what I needed. Cleans well for it being a wire product. I did buy it to fit my half sheet pan but it doesn’t fit all the way to the edge. There is a reasonable gap in the larger pan and it’s too big for the quarter sheet. I would recommend this product but just be conscious of the Measurements if that’s important to you.
customer_reviews.author: AngieBB

customer_reviews.title: This Cooking/Baking Rack Is Special....
customer_reviews.text: Received this before Christmas and used it in the oven with a standing rib roast. It was perfect for the job of keeping the roast off of the pan and creating some room for the circulation of heat. At the same time I was worried I would not be able to get it clean - with some olive oil spray before I put it in the oven, it cleaned up as good as new. I was pleased with this product and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Envirojoe55

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack
customer_reviews.text: Ok, these are good quality racks. They are sturdy. I was afraid they would be flimsy because of the price but I had nothing to fear. They are a nice addition to my kitchen. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I cannot say enough good things about this product
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this product. In fact I wanted to roder some more and it was not available! This is a great product. Imuse it to make home made jerky and the meat never sticks. And foremost, the design makes it so that meat dries well and does not stick. I use it to cool newly baked bread. It is versatile. I hope it becomes available again as I would like to order a few more!
customer_reviews.author: C. Neuman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love everything about this rack. I've used it twice for baking bacon. I like the way the bacon cooks evenly and it doesn't require constant attention like frying does. I didn't get grease splatter in the oven and there wasn't much grease on the aluminum foil I put in the pan under the rack. I've cleaned it in the dishwasher and by hand with no problems. It fits the baking sheet I already have perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Solid satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three different brand types of racks . By far this looks like the best one. I just wish I had ordered this one for my daughter. She just had her first baby and I know that they will be baking a lot together in the future. I ordered her someone else’s rack, which was ok. But this says “solid’. I am looking forward to trying this out for a lot more than cooling baked goods. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: C Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: EASY CLEANUP, RIGHT HEIGHT.
customer_reviews.text: We use it for baking and have used it to give a couple of steaks some minutes under the broiler. I have not found anything to dislike, so far all is very good with this rack. I would recommend it to anyone who likes to cook or bake.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rack
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted one of these for a long time. Just used it this morning too bake bacon. Excellent results...the bacon didn't even stick, and I didn't even bother to spray anything n the rack. Product was delivered timely and in perfect shape. This is an excellent rack that we will frequently use for many years, and we highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O’

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooking/Cooling Rack
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to use when I roast veggies and meat. This is sturdy and works beautifully for that. Will look for it in other sizes.
customer_reviews.author: pak

customer_reviews.title: Carries the freight when baking
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the food up high enough that you don't need to turn your wings over while baking. Cleans up well in dishwasher, seems fairly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben J. Beach

customer_reviews.title: Exemplary quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY particular about having quality cookware. Finding a cooling rack with this super high quality of stainless steel is totally impossible in any retail store. THIS ITEM IS TOP-OF-THE-LINE quality. I highly recommend purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nichols

product_meta.title: KITCHENATICS Commercial Grade 100% Stainless Steel Roasting and Cooling Rack Thick-Wire Grid Fits Half Sheet Baking Pan Oven & Grill Safe Rust-Proof for Cooking, Baking, BBQ Heavy Duty - 11.8" x 16.9"
feature_bullets: COMMERCIAL GRADE 304 (18/8) STAINLESS STEEL cooling rack, RUST-PROOF and DISHWASHER SAFE for easy cleanup long-lasting durability. NONTOXIC and NO ARTIFICIAL COATINGS that can harm your food and health. It is the perfect kitchen tool for a hot pan, or for baked goods, to cool down evenly and quickly.

SUPREME DURABILITY with 1-INCH (1") IN HEIGHT for optimal airflow, allows air to circulate around all sides of the pan for absolutely perfect cooking and cooling of baked bread, pastries, cakes, brownies, pies and cookies. This oven rack can be used like an air-fryer too, achieving the same crispy, crunchy and even baked results. Each cookie cooling rack’s individual wire spacing or grid size is about 3/8ths of an inch square.

OVEN-SAFE to 575˚F for effective roasting, grilling meat & seafood, baking, broiling, smoking, bbq and drying. There is no need to flip your food while cooking. You will get a crisp and juicy chicken, bacon, turkey, pulled pork, bbq ribs and other meat and vegetable dishes without any sweating.

ENHANCED with MULTIPLE WELDS on all HEAVY DUTY RAISED, THICK WIRE GRIDS 3-cross support bars for additional long lasting durability. No more bents and warping. The only baking rack in the market that has this added support to make sure you get the benefit of what you pay for lifetime use. This cooling rack can hold up to 40 lbs of meat without the cookie cooling rack bowing or bending and prevents thin baked goods from falling through the crack.
PERFECT FIT FOR POPULAR BRANDS of large 13" x 18" half sheet pan and cookie sheets. Wire rack for baking sheet dimensions: 11.81" x 16.85" . Pan is not included. Includes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,208 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
